level.text: 112.1 These bylaws may be amended from time to time, in any manner notnconsistent with the Act, by the affirmative vote of a majority of the entireembership of the Board at any meeting of the Board, if notice of the substancef the proposed Amendment be contained in the notice of the meeting, or if suchotice be waived as herein provided.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 45 DCR 3816, 3823 (June 12, 1998); asmended by Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 57 DCR 10919, 10925 (November9, 2010); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 60 DCR 8953 (June 14,013).
